item.title: Side Project 0.0.1
item.author: Lou Chang
item.description: Topic : 線上點餐系統 Skill List Necessary BackEnd : Asp.Net Core 6.0 AutoMapper(or Others) SignalR NoSQL (MongoDB) MicroService FrontEnd : VueJs 3 / Angular 13 TailwindCSS Optional Firebase Redis Repository Pattern Factory Pattern Problems 從何開始? 架構為何? 如何架構? (Use Figma to design.) 分層架構? 使用MicroS
